title: Government Says F*** It Mask Off, King Cobra COVID? 4.20.22
itunes:title: Government Says F*** It Mask Off, King Cobra COVID? 4.20.22
description:
In episode 1230, Jack and Miles are joined by anti-racism educator/activist, writer and host of White Homework and Go Home Bible You're Drunk, Tori Williams Douglass to discuss… The mask mandate getting axed feels like the right level of American cruelty, “Snake Venom in the Water Supply” is the Dumbest Covid Conspiracy Theory Yet and more!

  1. The mask mandate getting axed feels like the right level of American cruelty
  2. “Snake Venom in the Water Supply” is the Dumbest Covid Conspiracy Theory Yet
  3. COVID Conspiracy Theorists Are at War Over ‘Snake Venom’
  4. COVID-19 is Caused by a Virus, Not Snake Venom

LISTEN: Just What I Am by Kid Cudi

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
